Analyze: 这篇短文讲的是计算机的使用者是如何利用计算机达到合作、沟通的目的，而不是学习使用计算机的人（learner），更不是计算机的程序或工具了。选项C 是正确的。

Title:
Research shows that by using computers,students become better problemsolvers and better communicators.Over anetwork,using(1)andsharing files,students have the chance to collaborate and work(2)with other classmates,peers,and teachers.Networking electronically can(3)learners create,analyze,and produce information and ideas more(4)and efficiently. Networking people "put the inspiring and usable set of tools(5)reach of the mass of computer(6),empowering them to(7)beyond simply processing information to design, publish,and express"(Mello,1996). Through this (8)electronic access to the world around them, students'social awareness and (9)increase.Networking(10)them from the limitations of(11)writing tools that often inhibit and restrict writing processes.Learning is then (12)from a traditional passive-listening exercise to an experience of discovery,exploration,and excitement.Students can begin to(13)their full potential when(14)are empowered to contribute and collaborate as a team to accomplish their writing tasks (15)effectively.
请回答第（7）空
Analyze: Go beyond超越，固定词组。Power，名词，加前缀 em-构成动词，empower sb.to do sth.to后接动词原形。这些工具可以使计算机的使用者超越简单的信息分类层面.

Title:
Research shows that by using computers,students become better problemsolvers and better communicators.Over anetwork,using(1)andsharing files,students have the chance to collaborate and work(2)with other classmates,peers,and teachers.Networking electronically can(3)learners create,analyze,and produce information and ideas more(4)and efficiently. Networking people "put the inspiring and usable set of tools(5)reach of the mass of computer(6),empowering them to(7)beyond simply processing information to design, publish,and express"(Mello,1996). Through this (8)electronic access to the world around them, students'social awareness and (9)increase.Networking(10)them from the limitations of(11)writing tools that often inhibit and restrict writing processes.Learning is then (12)from a traditional passive-listening exercise to an experience of discovery,exploration,and excitement.Students can begin to(13)their full potential when(14)are empowered to contribute and collaborate as a team to accomplish their writing tasks (15)effectively.
请回答第（8）空
Analyze: 计算机的使用和普及正处于上升趋势，因此，计算机及电子通道的使用应是上升而不是下降，排除选项A和C。选项B，raise 通常指位置的升高，例如举起、站立等;也指条件的改善，声音的提高。而选项D，increase 则指数字、水平的提高。因此，选项 D是正确的。

Title:
Research shows that by using computers,students become better problemsolvers and better communicators.Over anetwork,using(1)andsharing files,students have the chance to collaborate and work(2)with other classmates,peers,and teachers.Networking electronically can(3)learners create,analyze,and produce information and ideas more(4)and efficiently. Networking people "put the inspiring and usable set of tools(5)reach of the mass of computer(6),empowering them to(7)beyond simply processing information to design, publish,and express"(Mello,1996). Through this (8)electronic access to the world around them, students'social awareness and (9)increase.Networking(10)them from the limitations of(11)writing tools that often inhibit and restrict writing processes.Learning is then (12)from a traditional passive-listening exercise to an experience of discovery,exploration,and excitement.Students can begin to(13)their full potential when(14)are empowered to contribute and collaborate as a team to accomplish their writing tasks (15)effectively.
请回答第（9）空
Analyze: 根据上述对上下文的解释，这里应是指信心提高了。Confidence 信心，consideration考虑、关心， convenience 方便，conscience 良心。此题主要考查词汇的辨认。选项 A是正确的

Title:
Research shows that by using computers,students become better problemsolvers and better communicators.Over anetwork,using(1)andsharing files,students have the chance to collaborate and work(2)with other classmates,peers,and teachers.Networking electronically can(3)learners create,analyze,and produce information and ideas more(4)and efficiently. Networking people "put the inspiring and usable set of tools(5)reach of the mass of computer(6),empowering them to(7)beyond simply processing information to design, publish,and express"(Mello,1996). Through this (8)electronic access to the world around them, students'social awareness and (9)increase.Networking(10)them from the limitations of(11)writing tools that often inhibit and restrict writing processes.Learning is then (12)from a traditional passive-listening exercise to an experience of discovery,exploration,and excitement.Students can begin to(13)their full potential when(14)are empowered to contribute and collaborate as a team to accomplish their writing tasks (15)effectively.
请回答第（10）空

Research shows that by using computers,students become better problemsolvers and better communicators.Over anetwork,using(1)andsharing files,students have the chance to collaborate and work(2)with other classmates,peers,and teachers.Networking electronically can(3)learners create,analyze,and produce information and ideas more(4)and efficiently. Networking people 'put the inspiring and usable set of tools(5)reach of the mass of computer(6),empowering them to(7)beyond simply processing information to design, publish,and express'(Mello,1996). Through this (8)electronic access to the world around them, students'social awareness and (9)increase.Networking(10)them from the limitations of(11)writing tools that often inhibit and restrict writing processes.Learning is then (12)from a traditional passive-listening exercise to an experience of discovery,exploration,and excitement.Students can begin to(13)their full potential when(14)are empowered to contribute and collaborate as a team to accomplish their writing tasks (15)effectively.
请回答第（11）空
Analyze: writing tools that often inhibit and restrict writing processes这个句子。That 从句修饰写作工具是什么样的，说这样的工具常常是 inhibit andrestrict 了写作过程。两个动词并列，说明意思属于同类。strict 严格的，形容词，加前缀 re构成动词，意思不会有大的改变 （限制、约束）。前一个动词即便不知道也不影响对这句话的理解 （inhibit 抑制、约束）。再看这个空的前面已有 limitation（限制）说明后面的写作是要限制作者的。由此断定，这种写作只能是传统的。第 11 题选项D是正确的。

Title:
Research shows that by using computers,students become better problemsolvers and better communicators.Over anetwork,using(1)andsharing files,students have the chance to collaborate and work(2)with other classmates,peers,and teachers.Networking electronically can(3)learners create,analyze,and produce information and ideas more(4)and efficiently. Networking people "put the inspiring and usable set of tools(5)reach of the mass of computer(6),empowering them to(7)beyond simply processing information to design, publish,and express"(Mello,1996). Through this (8)electronic access to the world around them, students'social awareness and (9)increase.Networking(10)them from the limitations of(11)writing tools that often inhibit and restrict writing processes.Learning is then (12)from a traditional passive-listening exercise to an experience of discovery,exploration,and excitement.Students can begin to(13)their full potential when(14)are empowered to contribute and collaborate as a team to accomplish their writing tasks (15)effectively.
请回答第（12）空
Analyze: 根据上下文，网络的写作是由原来的被动变成了主动，因此，学习得到了改善。选项 C 是正确的。再一个判断是根据语法，这里是被动态，需要一个动词的过去分词，D 选项被排除。剩下的两个就很容易从字面的意义排除了。Moved 搬运，pass 传递，transfer 转移，transform 改善。

Analyze: 全文强调的是通过网络，学生增加了合作，也因此增强了信心，提高了能力，同时意识到了自己潜在的能力。选项 B 是正确的。Realize 意识到，see 看到，dream 梦想，develop 发展。

Title: The soldier died for saving the child,so his ______ is heavier than Mount Tai
Analyze: 那个士兵为了救了这个孩子而死了，所以他的死比泰山更重

Title: Stephenson became the _______ railway engineer in the world.
Analyze: 句意：史蒂芬森成为了世界上铁路工程师的先驱。lead带领；leader领导；leading主导，最重要的;leadership领导。

Title: To everyone' s ______ ,the girl finished the job quite well.
Analyze: satisfied a.满足的;满意的 ；satisfactory a.令人满意的;可喜的  ；satisfying a.令人满意的;使人满足的 ； satisfaction n.满足;满意。句意：令所有人满意的是，女孩做得很好 。To everyone' s 后面接名词。故选D。

Title: ─What are you doing here?─Oh,my teacher asked me to write a passage about ______. -You can write ________ passage in English?
Analyze:
选项A:一篇600字的文章：a 600-wordpassage，故此项错；
选项B:一篇600字的文章：a 600-wordpassage，故此项错；
选项C:a passage about600 words:一篇大约600字的文章，a 600-wordpassage:一篇600字的文章；
选项D:一篇600字的文章：a 600-wordpassage，故此项错；

Title: No one should enter the spot without the ______ of the police.
Analyze: without 后面有the所以用名词形式。句意：未经警方许可，任何人不得进入现场。

Title: The shop owner welcomed all the guests with a ______ smile.
Analyze: Practice练习，实践；practise练习，实践；practical实际的；practiced熟练的，老练的。句意：这个商店的老板带着老练的微笑欢迎顾客们。故选D。

Title: My TV is out of order. Can you tell me about the ______ news on Iraq War?
二级目录: 第五章 形容词和副词
Analyze: 本题考查形近词的含义。lately意为“最近，近来”；latest意为“最近的，最新的”；later意为“后来，较晚”；latter做名词，意为“后者”。根据题意“我的电视坏了。你能告诉我有关伊拉克战争的最新消息吗？”可知选B。

Title: The Great Wall is more than 6,000 li in ______.
Analyze: in length 在长度上

Title: The necklace that she lost is very expensive. It' s of great______
二级目录: 第五章 形容词和副词
Analyze: of great value=valuable意为“贵重的，有价值的”；valueless意为“无价值的, 不值钱的, 不足道的”。

Title: There were ______ fish in the river iri South America.
二级目录: 第五章 形容词和副词
Analyze: 本题考察形容词，in danger有危险，danger危险； dangerous危险的；dangerless无危险的。句意：伊里南美的河里有很多危险的鱼。选项C词性词义最为恰当。因此选C。

Title: The letter “b“ in the word “doubt“ is ______.
二级目录: 第五章 形容词和副词
Analyze:
这句话的意思是：“字母b在这个单词doubt中是不发音的。”

A. sound 作动词：听起来  作名词：声音
B. silent 形容词：不发音的，无声的
C. silence 名词：不发音，无声，沉默
D. sounded 动词：听起来
故选B.

Title: The child looked at me ______.
二级目录: 第五章 形容词和副词
Analyze: 句意：那个小孩奇怪地看着我。A选项意为：陌生人；B选项意为：奇怪地。C选项意为：陌生的。D选项意为：陌生。故本题B选项最符合题意

Title: The black people were against slavery and fought for their ____bravely.
二级目录: 第五章 形容词和副词
Analyze: 考查词义辨析.黑人是为自由而战,要用名词作宾语.free的名词形式是freedom.

Title: We have to learn ______ technology from other countries.
二级目录: 第五章 形容词和副词
Analyze: we have to learn advanced technology from other countries. 句意：我们必须学习其他国家的先进技术.A选项意为：前进，进步。B选项：进步,上涨。C选项意为：利益;优势; D选项意为：先进的;高级的;故D选项符合题意。

Title: The children live in a village ______ They come here almost every day.
二级目录: 第五章 形容词和副词
Analyze: nearby一般放在所修饰的名词之后, 也可以放在名词之前。

Title: You ' d better give up smoking if you want to keep ______.
二级目录: 第五章 形容词和副词
Analyze: health变形容词直接加y

Title: ______ speaking, l didn ' t do it on purpose.
二级目录: 第五章 形容词和副词
Analyze: 本题考查短语固定搭配，Honestly speaking 老实说；Honestly speaking, l didn ' t do it on purpose. 句意：老实说，我不是有意做的。选A。

Title: The ______ of the clock showed that it was time for supper.
Analyze: 句意：时钟的指针显示现在该吃晚饭了。时钟的指针用hands表示，故选D

Title: My brother came in,changed his______and went out again.
Analyze: 我哥哥进来了，换了衣服，又出去了。

Title: He gave his listeners a wonderful ______ of his journey through Egypt.
Analyze: 句意：他向听众讲述了他穿越埃及的精彩故事。account账户；tale故事；news新闻；play游戏。故本题B选项符合题意。

Title: The ______ of this rope is ten meters.
Analyze: 这根绳子的长度约为十米。

Title: I ate ______ of the cake and my brother ate ______ of it.
Analyze: one third三分之一，为单数形式，two thirds三分之二，用复数形式，third加s.

Title: Professor Smith ______ my success in the exam.
二级目录: 第九章 陈述句、疑问句、祈使句、感叹句
三级目录: 陈述句、疑问句、祈使句、感叹句
Analyze: 句意：史密斯教授对我的考试成绩评价很高。thought highly of被高度重视；was in charge of负责；had a word with有过一句话；looked worried about看起来很担心。故本题选A。

Title: ohn,hurry up! There' s someone ______ to speak to you ______ the telephone.
Analyze: 哦，快点！有人在等着和你打电话。

Title: The sun ______ in the east and ______ in the west.
Analyze: 句意：太阳从东边升起，从西方落下。这是一个事实，肯定只能用一般现在时态，the sun太阳是单数形式，故选择用rises，sets。

Title: The old professor ______ his glasses to read the letter.
Analyze: 句意：老教授戴上眼镜看信。戴上眼镜，用put on 表示。故本题选B

Title: I ______ an answer to my letter within a few days.
Analyze: 句意：我希望在几天内能收到回信。表示殷切的希望使用expect, C项应加上to。

Title: What time does the bus ______ Beijing?
Analyze: 句意：公共汽车几点去北京？其中“leave+地点”表示“离开某地，而“leave for +地点”表示“去某地” ，A、B、C表达的英语语境都不符合，故选D。

Title: 从每道题的四个选项中，选出一个意思与句中划线部分最接近的答案。We  <u>searched for</u>  the lost cat,but we couldn't find it.
Analyze: 句意;我们搜寻了那只迷路的猫，但找不到。searched for意为搜索，搜寻。looked at意为看着 ；looked for意为寻找，搜索；looked after 意为照顾 ；looked up意为抬头。故B选项符合。

Title: There is ______ apple on the desk.
Analyze: apple是单数，且是元音开头

Title: Yesterday I went to ______ work on ______ foot.
Analyze: go to work去工作,on foot 步行

Title: There is ______ letter“h“ in the word“hour“ ,but ______ “h“ doesn' t make a sound.
Analyze: a用于辅音音素词单数前，an用于元音音素开头的可数名词单数前。letter是辅音音素L开头，故a；后面the “h", 代指前面的letter "h" .故选B。

Title: The train is running fifty miles ______ .
Analyze: hour中h不发音，所以按元音处理，选an

Title: ─Is ______ here?─No. Li Lei and Han Mei have asked for leave.
二级目录: 第九章 陈述句、疑问句、祈使句、感叹句
三级目录: 陈述句、疑问句、祈使句、感叹句
Analyze: 句意：大家都在吗？─没有。 李雷和韩梅已经请假了。everybody每个人；somebody某人；anybody任何人；nobody没有人。故本题选A符合题意。

Title: The car is running ______ the speed of 120 kilometers an hour.
Analyze: 句意为：火车在以每小时200公里的速度行驶。at the speed of是固定短语，表示“以……速度”。结合选项可知应选C。

Title: What he did was opposite ______ what he said
Analyze: be opposite to 与……相反  ； 意思是:他所做的事与他所说的相反。故选B

Title: Can you tell me the difference ______ the two words?
Analyze:
between 用于2者的
of 应该有固定搭配

Title: ______ all the subjects ,he is best ______ English .
Analyze: of  all the subjects  在所有科目里面 ； at 擅长做...good at ,  best是good的最高级。句意：在所有科目里，他最擅长英语。故选D。

Title: He is only ten months. He can ______ read ______ write.
Analyze: either...or...意为"或者……或者……；不是……就是……"之意。表示两者之一，连接句子中两个并列的成分。neither...nor...表示"既不……也不……"。其含义是否定的，可连接任意两个并列的成份。both ; and(与复数名词连用)两个，两个都; 不仅…而且…; …和…都;so ; that，如此，以至于...本题句意：他才十个月。他既不会读也不会写。

Title: She said she might come ______ Saturday ______ Sunday.
Analyze: too......to翻译: 太.....而不能 。too的后面接形容词或副词的原形,to的后面接动词原形是一个否定句式。本题选either...or...意为"或者……或者……；不是……就是……"之意。表示两者之一，连接句子中两个并列的成分。She said she might come either Saturday or Sunday.她说她可能星期六或星期天来。

Title: I' ll give her the message ______ she comes back .
Analyze: since 自…以后;before 在…以前;在…面前(或前面)；until 到…时;直到…为止；as soon as 立刻;一…就…结合语境，选as soon as， I' ll give her the message as soon as she comes back .句意：她一回来我就给她留言。

Title: ______ the teacher came into the classroom,many students were talking to each other.
Analyze: when既指时间点，也可指一段时间，when引导的时间状语从句中的动词可以是终止性动词，也可以是延续性动词。When the teacher came into the classroom,many students were talking to each other.句意：当老师走进教室时，许多学生正在互相交谈。

Title: Read the sentences slowly ______ we can understand what you read.
Analyze:
so that的意思是以致、为了、以便于；so that 引导目的状语从句,常放于句中。Read the sentences slowly so that you can understand what you read.
读慢点，这样我们就能理解你读的。

Title: While in Paris,she didn' t ______ have a meal in an expensive restaurant.
二级目录: 第五章 形容词和副词

Title: The cat gave birth to two babies a week ______ .
二级目录: 第五章 形容词和副词
Analyze: before+一段时间    ； 一段时间+ago ， 所以这里填ago更合适

Title: ______ the dictionary,l couldn' t afford to buy it.

三级目录: 陈述句、疑问句、祈使句、感叹句
Analyze: 句意：虽然我很喜欢这本词典, 但我买不起。补充部分后面是接名词the dictionary，故选C。

Title: E-mali ,as well as telephone , ______ an important part in daily communication .

Title: Nobody ______ seen the film. It ' s a pity.
二级目录: 第九章 陈述句、疑问句、祈使句、感叹句
三级目录: 陈述句、疑问句、祈使句、感叹句
Analyze: 考查主谓一致。Nobody but sb.“除了某人没人......”；作主语时，谓语与but前的一致；句意“除了我的朋友们，没有人看过那场电影。多遗憾啊。”谓语跟but前的一致，nobody看作单数，排除A、B、D。故选C。

Title: ─Where is your brother? ─There ______ .
二级目录: 第九章 陈述句、疑问句、祈使句、感叹句
三级目录: 陈述句、疑问句、祈使句、感叹句
Analyze:
当副词置于句首的时候,通常要全部倒装 如： There comes the bus.
但是 如果主语是代词 不用倒装 There he comes.

Title: Seldom ______ any mistakes during my past five years of service here .
二级目录: 第九章 陈述句、疑问句、祈使句、感叹句
三级目录: 陈述句、疑问句、祈使句、感叹句
Analyze: Seldom 从不的意思，表示否定，放在句首，这时必须要主谓倒装，所以用did I  。句子意思理解起来是 ：  在这里工作的五年里，我很少犯错。

Title: Mr. Smith promised to help me and ______ the next day.
二级目录: 第九章 陈述句、疑问句、祈使句、感叹句
三级目录: 陈述句、疑问句、祈使句、感叹句
Analyze:
这题考的是倒装句，So 引导的倒装句：一、 so + 助动词/情态动词/be动词 + 主语，表示“……也一样”。 否定：把so改为 
nor/neither, 其他不变。二、 so +主语 + 助动词/情态动词/be动词，表示“的确是这样”,情况属实。 前后两句主语：一致； 其他要点和第一要点接近。题干：Mr. Smith promised to help me and so he did the next day. 句意：史密斯先生答应帮助我，所以他第二天就答应了，这里有个关键词"and"，and 前后词性一致，所以不可能为否定句，排除AC，然后根据句意选B。

Title: ______ the crops would be saved.
二级目录: 第九章 陈述句、疑问句、祈使句、感叹句
三级目录: 陈述句、疑问句、祈使句、感叹句
Analyze: 本题考查与将来事实相反的虚拟语气，故从句用should + v原形。句意：如果下雨，农作物将会被拯救。

Title: 将下列各句变为倒装句：If they were to hear you talking,they would think you were a socialist.
二级目录: 第十一章 强调和倒装

Title: 将下列各句变为倒装句：If I should not be so busy,l would be most happy to go down with you.
二级目录: 第十一章 强调和倒装
Analyze: Should I not be so busy,l would be most happy to go down with you.

Title: In China, ______ bicycle is ______ popular means of transportation.
Analyze:
【考情点拨】本题考查冠词的用法。
【应试指导】句意：在中国，自行车是一种普遍的 交通方式。“the a( an)+单数名词”表示“类属”故第一空的冠词用the或a均可；第二空指一种 交通方式，应用不定冠词a。

Title: Jack is______news reporter and he likes______job very much
Analyze: 【应试指导】本题考查冠词辨析。，句意：Jack是一个新闻记者，而且他很热爱这份工作。第一个空用a，表示泛指；第二个空用the，因为前面已经提到他的职业，这里表示特指。

Title: My parents and I couldn' t get into the house last night because______of us had the key.
Analyze: 【应试指导】本题考查代词辨析。句意：我和我的父母昨晚没能进入这所房子，因为我们没有人有钥匙。 either指两者中的任一个，all指代所有的人或物，neither指两者都不，都不合题意，故排除A、B、D。表示三者或三者以上的人或物都没有需要用none，故选C。

Title:
D
Welcome to North Road Medical Centre! We are open from 8 ：30 a. m. until 6 p. m. Monday to Friday. Appointments (预约)with the doctors and nurses are acceptable both morning and afternoon. However, a same-day appointment may not necessarily be with your usual doctor. Patients may be seen by any member of the team.
If you decide to register (注册)with us,please speak to one of our receptionists (接诊员). You will need to complete a registration form. Each new patient is asked to answer some medical questions. You should also make an appointment to see one of the nurses for a health check soon after registering. There is sometimes a delay in handing over medical records from your earlier doctor,and this appointment gives us valuable information about your health.
The Out of Hours Service is reachable from 6:30 p. m. until 8 a. m. Monday to Friday;at weekends from 6： 30 p. m. Friday to 8 a. m. Monday. Telephone 0845-345-8995 to talk to the Out of Hours Service. They will have a doctor get in touch with you.
For medical advice,you can call NHS Direct (24 hours) on 0845-4647 or through the Internet at www. nhsdirect. nhs. com. You can always get advice over the telephone.
If you are too ill to come to the medical centre,you can ask for a home visit over the telephone. Most visits by doctors are made between 12 noon and 3 p. m. If you are able to phone before 11 a. m. ,this helps us to plan the day.
What can we learn from paragraph 1?
A: The centre opens all week round．
B: Doctors and nurses work six hours a day.
C: Appointments are not accepted in the afternoon.
D: A same-day appointment may not be with the usual doctor．
Analyze: 【应试指导】事实细节题。由第一段倒数第二句可如，同一天预约的医生不一定是你常看的医生。故选D。

When do most doctors go for a home visit?
Analyze: 句意：大多数医生什么时候去家访？根据“If you are too ill to come to the medical centre,you can ask for a home visit over the telephone Most visits by doctors are made between 12 noon and 3 p. m”如果您病得太重而无法前往医疗中心，您可以通过电话要求进行家访。大多数医生会在中午 12 点到下午 3 点之间就诊。可知，本题选C。

Title: I'll never forget the day______I became a doctor.
Analyze: 【应试指导】本题考查定语从句。句意：我永远不会忘记我成为医生的那一天。“the day”是表示时间的先行词，关系副词when引导定语从句可修饰表示时间的先行词，在定语从句中充当时间状语。故选Do

Title: My bedroom was very small, with the window______the street.
Analyze: 【应试指导】本题考查非谓语动词。句意：我的卧室很小，窗户对着街道。由于“the window“和 “face”之间是主动关系，所以应该使用动词的现在分词形式。故选B

Title: I chose this coat in the end because______ones were all too expensive.
Analyze: 本题考查代词辨析。句意：最后我选择了这件外套，因为其他的外套都太贵了。the others特指某范围内的“其他的人或物”，其后不能再接名词，相当于the other+复数名词；another表示三者或三者以上中的“另一个”，其后一般接名词单数；others表示“其余的人或物”，其后不能再接名词。故D正确

Title:
-____will John get to the company？
-In three hours.
二级目录: 第十一章 强调和倒装
Analyze: 本题考查对一段时间的提问方式。句意：--约翰多久能到公司？ --三个小时后。how soon多久之后（问解决事情等的速度），以“in+时间段”作答；how long多久了（问时长），以“for+时间段”或“since+时间点”作答；how often多经常（问频率），常以“数词+ times a week/month/year.”作答；how fast多快（问速度）。故本题选A。

Title: -Do you like talking with your friends on the phone or through the Internet?______.I enjoy writing letters.

Title:
What a nice fire you have in your fireplace!
During the winter I like my house＿.
Analyze: 句意：你壁炉里的火真旺啊！——在冬天我喜欢房子既温暖又舒服。作宾语补足语，需用形容词说明宾语的特征，不能用副词形式。而且and连接的两个词通常词性是一致的。warm，comfortable是形容词，修饰名词house.因此本题选B。

Title: It was raining heavily and little Mary felt cold, so she stood＿to her mother.
Analyze: 固定搭配close to表靠近，故选A

Title: The child looked at me＿.
Analyze: 副词修饰动词look,故选B

Title: The black people were against slavery and fought for their ＿bravely.
Analyze: 名词freedom用在their的后面，故选C

Title: No one should enter the spot without the＿of the police.
Analyze: 名词，定冠词the+名词permission,故选B

Title: To everyone' s＿,the girl finished the job quite well.
Analyze: 名词,名词所有格+名词satisfaction，故选D

Title: You'd better put your＿in the bank.
Analyze: 名词所有格your+名词复数 多种贵重物品valuables故选A

Title:
What are you doing here?
Oh, my teacher asked me to write a passage of about ＿in English.
You can write a＿passage in English?
Analyze: 数词+名词复数words; 600-word作定语，故选C

Title: ___speaking, l didn’t do it on purpose.
Analyze: 固定搭配Honestly speaking老实说,故选A

Title: Dan caught two___birds in the wood last week and they are still___in the cage.
Analyze: 形容词live作定语，表示活着，修饰名词bird；表语活着alive，故选C

Title: Her face is＿to me， but I can't remember where I saw her.
Analyze: familiar的意思是熟悉。我对他的样子很熟悉。但是我不记得在哪见过他。

Title: They climbed to the top of the hill＿they could get a bird's eye view of the city.
Analyze: in order that从而。他们爬到山顶，以至于能够鸟瞰这座成时。

Title: It wasn't an accident.  He did it on ＿.
Analyze: on purpose故意。这不是一场意外，他是故意的。

Title: Mother＿us stories when we were young.
Analyze: used to do过去常常做某事。妈妈在我小时候经常给我讲故事。

Title: You'll have to pay for the holiday in＿, Tom.
Analyze: in advance提前。汤姆，你将不得不提前付钱度假。

Title: I never expected you to ＿at the meeting.  I thought you were abroad.
Analyze: turn up出现。我没料到你会在会议中出现。我以为你出国了。

Title: When they had finished playing, the children were made to ＿all the toys they had taken out.
Analyze: put away摆放整齐。当他们结束嬉戏，孩子们被要求把玩具摆放整齐

Title: He might have been killed ＿the arrival of the police.
Analyze: but for除了...之外 要不是警方赶到，他们在就被杀害了。

Title: Have you finished the paper? Time is＿.
Analyze: running out耗尽。 你写完论文了吗？截止时间快到期了。

Title: Let's go into the garden and＿some roses for your mother.
Analyze: pick摘取。让我们去花园摘一些玫瑰给你妈吧。

Title: There are 10__ assistants in that __shop.
Analyze: 妇女的名词复数women.鞋店用单数shoe shop

Title:
How far is it from your home to the post office?
It's about a __walk.
Analyze: 数词+连词符号+单位名称单数作定语，修饰后面的名词。two-mile walk两英里的路。

Title: I found her sitting in the corner, reading __ newspaper, with __in her eyes.
Analyze: 报纸可数，一张报纸用单数a. 眼泪是几滴眼泪，不确定数目，用名词复数tears.

Title: In fact, ____ one cause that leads to the problem.
Analyze: cattle(牲畜，牛)为集合名词，尽管它不带复数词尾-s，却永远表示复数意义，若用作主语，谓语要用复数

Title: I need__ cloth,for I'm going to make __ clothes.
Analyze: cloth表示布料，不可数名词。clothes表示衣服，可数名词。

Title: You can't find many __ in a hospital.
Analyze: 男护士 men nurses 定语men也用复数形式。

Title: I like that son of  __.
Analyze: 名词所有格，约翰的姐姐的儿子，用John's sister's

Title: March 8 is __day.
Analyze: 妇女节Women's Day, 名词复数所有格作定语。

Title: Our school is only 15 __from here.
Analyze: 15分钟的步行，用复数形式15 minutes' walk

Title: There are different __in the pond.
Analyze: 不同种类的鱼，fish用复数形式"fishes", different kinds of fishes

Don’t worry. It'll be broadcast___.

Title:
Lucy, can you tell me when Linda ___here?
I'm not sure, but she ___to be here at ten to nine.

二级目录: 第二章 阅读理解（Reading Comprehension）
Analyze: 你能否告诉我Linda什么时候将到达？be supposed to do表示原本做某事，经常与现实相反。

Title: You___ the meeting to tell me that. You could have come up to me afterwards.

Title:
You didn't wait for Mr. Smith last night, did you?
Yes, but we ____. He didn't return home at all.

Title: There was a lot of fun at yesterday’s party. You ___, but why didn't you?

Title:

Title: Jack wishes that he ___ business instead of history when he was in university.

Title: It’s time I ___school.

Title: The women carrying babies, come in first, ___?

Title:

Title: I don't think a warm winter always has a negative influence on our life, ___?

_____.

Title: Progress so far has been very good. We are , ___, confident that the work will be completed on time.

Title: He is a nice listener; ____he feels the time is right he will give you his thoughts.

Title: They wanted to charge $5,000 for the car, ___ we managed to bring the price down.

Title: A man cannot smile like a child, ___a child smiles with his eyes, while a man smiles with his lips alone.

Title: You must keep on working in the evening ___ you are sure you can finish the task in time.
二级目录: 第十章 简单句、并列句、复合句
Analyze: 关联词unless表示除非，引导条件状语从句。

Title: Mount Wuyi is an attractive place of interest ____everyone likes to visit.
二级目录: 第十章 简单句、并列句、复合句
Analyze: 这座山是个很有吸引力的地方，因为大家都喜欢游览。as引导原因状语从句，表因为。

Title: He was driving so fast as to get himself into a dangerous situation ___ he is likely to lose the   control over his car.
二级目录: 第十章 简单句、并列句、复合句
Analyze: 考查定语从句 句意：他驾车速度如此之快以至于把自己置于可能会对汽车失去控制的危险处境。本句考查定语从句，先行词为situation, situation在定语从句中作状语(He is likely to lose control over his car in the situation.)，故用关系副词where

Title: It is imagination ___ makes the world colorful, full of vigor and vitality.

Analyze: it is...that...是强调句，即：去掉这些关联词，剩下的部分仍然可以组成完整的句子。

Title: If you___stayed at home, this would never have happened.
一级目录: 第四部分 综合知识
二级目录: 第二章 阅读理解（Reading Comprehension）
Analyze:
【考情点拨】考查虚拟语气。
【应试指导】句意：要是你待在家里的话，这件事就不会发生了。此处为if引导的虚拟条件句，主句的谓语为“would+have+过去分词”形式，所以这里表示与过去事实相反的虚拟语气，if条件句中的谓语形式应为过去完成式形式，故选B。

Title: We had a long way to go so we decided to____ early.

【应试指导】句意：有很长一段路要走，所以我们决定早点出发。set on袭击；put on穿上；set off出发，起身；put off推迟。

Title: ____ it is not his responsibility to do that, he said he would help.

【应试指导】句意：尽管做那件事并不是他的职责所在，他仍说他会帮忙。although尽管，虽然，即使，表示让步；as因为，表示原因；since因为，由于，表示原因；unless除非，表示转折。

Title: One of the strongest hurricanes _____ was the Florida Keys Storm of 1935, during which 500 people were killed.

二级目录: 第二章 阅读理解（Reading Comprehension）
Analyze:
【考情点拨】考查非谓语动词。
【应试指导】句意：有记载的最强的飓风之一是1935年的佛罗里达群岛风暴，此风暴造成500人死亡。the strongest humcanes与record之间为被动关系，所以要用record的过去分词形式，作the strongest hurncanes的后置定语。

Title: Ms. Jolie is ___beautiful and very talented, and in control of her own career.

Analyze:

【应试指导】句意：朱莉女士美丽出众，才华卓越，而且执掌着自己的事业。basically基本地； remarkably非常地，显著地；perfectly究全地，完美地；actively积极地。

Title: When John left the office, Amy __ at her desk.
一级目录: 第四部分 综合知识
二级目录: 第二章 阅读理解（Reading Comprehension）
Analyze:
【考情点拨】考查动词的时态。
【应试指导】句意：约翰离开办公室时，艾米仍然在工作。由时间状语when John left the office可知，谓语动词时态应为过去进行时，表示过去某一时刻或某一时间段正在进行的动作，故选D。

Title: Is this the factory ___ you visited the other day?
一级目录: 第四部分 综合知识

Analyze:
【考情点拨】考查定语从句。
  【应试指寻】句意：这是你前几天参观过的工厂吗？that引导定语从句，修饰先行词the factory，且在从句中充当宾语，符合题意。

Title:
Passage One
Alexia Sloane, a 10-year-old girl, lost her sight when she was two following a brain disease. But despite her disability she has excelled at languages and is already fluent in English, French, Spanish and Chinese-and is learning German.
Now she has experienced her dream job of working as an interpreter after East of England MEP (欧盟议员) Robert Sturdy invited her to the parliament building in Brussels, thus becoming the youngest interpreter to work at the European Parliament.
“She was given a special permit to get into the building, where there is usually a minimum age requirement of 14, and sat in a booth listening and interpreting," said her mother, Isabelle. “The other interpreters were amazed at how well she did as the debate was quite complicated and many of the words were rather technical."
Alexia has been tri-lingual since birth as her mother, a teacher, is half French and half Spanish, while her father, Richard, is English. She started talking and communicating in all three languages before she lost her sight but adapted quickly to her blindness. By the age of four, she was reading and writing in Braille (盲文). When she was six, Alexia began to learn Chinese. The girl is now learning German at school in Cambridge.
Alexia has been longing to be an interpreter since she was six and she chose to go to the European Parliament as her prize when she won a young achiever of the year award. She asked if she could shadow interpreters and Mr. Sturdy agreed to take her along as his guest.
Alexia worked with the head of interpreting and had a real taste of life in parliament. “It was fantastic and I'm absolutely determined now to become an interpreter," she said.
What does the passage tell about Alexia Sloane?
一级目录: 第四部分 综合知识
二级目录: 第二章 阅读理解（Reading Comprehension）
A: She is very proud of her parents.
B: She has learned five foreign languages.
C: She is a quick learner of languages.
D: She has difficulties with language learning.
Analyze:
【考情点拨】推理判断题。
【应试指导】由第一段第二句可知，Alexia Sloane擅长学习语言，她已经学习了英语、法语、西班牙语和汉语，现在正在学习德语。由此可知，B、D两项都不正确。而且由第一段也可知，她只有10岁，但已经掌握了四种语言，可见她在语言方面学得很快，故选C。

Title:
Passage One
Alexia Sloane, a 10-year-old girl, lost her sight when she was two following a brain disease. But despite her disability she has excelled at languages and is already fluent in English, French, Spanish and Chinese-and is learning German.
Now she has experienced her dream job of working as an interpreter after East of England MEP (欧盟议员) Robert Sturdy invited her to the parliament building in Brussels, thus becoming the youngest interpreter to work at the European Parliament.
“She was given a special permit to get into the building, where there is usually a minimum age requirement of 14, and sat in a booth listening and interpreting," said her mother, Isabelle. “The other interpreters were amazed at how well she did as the debate was quite complicated and many of the words were rather technical."
Alexia has been tri-lingual since birth as her mother, a teacher, is half French and half Spanish, while her father, Richard, is English. She started talking and communicating in all three languages before she lost her sight but adapted quickly to her blindness. By the age of four, she was reading and writing in Braille (盲文). When she was six, Alexia began to learn Chinese. The girl is now learning German at school in Cambridge.
Alexia has been longing to be an interpreter since she was six and she chose to go to the European Parliament as her prize when she won a young achiever of the year award. She asked if she could shadow interpreters and Mr. Sturdy agreed to take her along as his guest.
Alexia worked with the head of interpreting and had a real taste of life in parliament. “It was fantastic and I'm absolutely determined now to become an interpreter," she said.
The tone of the passage can be best described as______.
一级目录: 第四部分 综合知识
二级目录: 第二章 阅读理解（Reading Comprehension）
Analyze:
【考情点拨】推理判断题。
【应试指导】由第一段第二句中的“she has excelled at languages and is already fluent in English...”及下面段落的叙述可知，作者写这篇文章充满了赞赏之情，故选B。

Title:
Passage Two
Generations of Americans have been brought up to believe that a good breakfast is essential to one’s life. Eating breakfast at the start of the day, we have been told, and told again, is as necessary as putting gasoline in the family car before starting a trip. But for many people, the thought of food as the first thing in the morning is never a pleasure. So despite all the efforts, they still take no breakfast.
Between 1977 and 1983, the latest year for which figures could be obtained, the number of people who didn't have breakfast increased by 33%—from 8.8 million to 11.7 million—according to the Chicago-based Market Research Corporation of America. For those who dislike eating breakfast, however, there is some good news.
Several studies in the last few years have shown that, for adults especially, there may be nothing wrong with omitting breakfast. “Going without breakfast does not affect work," said Arnold E. Bender, former professor of nutrition at Queen Elizabeth College in London, “nor does giving people breakfast improve work.” Scientific evidence linking breakfast to better health or better work is surprisingly inadequate (不充分的) , and most of the recent work involves children, not adults.“The literature,” says one researcher, Dr. Earnest Polite at the University of Texas “is poor.”
Which is closest in meaning to the underlined part?
一级目录: 第四部分 综合知识
二级目录: 第二章 阅读理解（Reading Comprehension）
A: Having breakfast does not improve work, either.
C: Going without breakfast can improve work, too.
Analyze:
【考情点拨】句意理解题。
【应试指导】 由第三段第二句“Going without breakfast does not affect work…‘nor does giving people breakfast improve work．’”可知，不吃早饭不影响工作，吃早餐也不会提高工作效率，故选A。

Title:
Passage Two
Generations of Americans have been brought up to believe that a good breakfast is essential to one’s life. Eating breakfast at the start of the day, we have been told, and told again, is as necessary as putting gasoline in the family car before starting a trip. But for many people, the thought of food as the first thing in the morning is never a pleasure. So despite all the efforts, they still take no breakfast.
Between 1977 and 1983, the latest year for which figures could be obtained, the number of people who didn't have breakfast increased by 33%—from 8.8 million to 11.7 million—according to the Chicago-based Market Research Corporation of America. For those who dislike eating breakfast, however, there is some good news.
Several studies in the last few years have shown that, for adults especially, there may be nothing wrong with omitting breakfast. “Going without breakfast does not affect work," said Arnold E. Bender, former professor of nutrition at Queen Elizabeth College in London, “nor does giving people breakfast improve work.” Scientific evidence linking breakfast to better health or better work is surprisingly inadequate (不充分的) , and most of the recent work involves children, not adults.“The literature,” says one researcher, Dr. Earnest Polite at the University of Texas “is poor.”
Which of the following statements best summarizes the writer's conclusion about the function of breakfast?
一级目录: 第四部分 综合知识
二级目录: 第二章 阅读理解（Reading Comprehension）
C: Scientists' have produced sufficient evidence in support of breakfast.
D: There isn't strong evidence to prove that breakfast is a must.
Analyze:
【考情点拨】推理判断题。
【应试指导】作者的观点可从最后一段倒数第二句看出来，由这句话“Scientific evidence linking breakfast...not adults．”可知，还没有足够的证据证明吃早餐对健康和工作有利，也就是说没有足够的证据证明吃早餐是必要的，故选D。

Title:
Passage Four
Ideas about polite behaviour differ from one culture to another. Some societies, such as America and Australia, for example, are mobile and very open. People here change jobs and move house quite often. As a result, they have a lot of relationships that often last only a short time, and they need to get to know people quickly. So it’s normal to have friendly conversations with people that they have just met, and you can talk about things that other cultures would regard as personal.
On the other hand, there are more crowded and less mobile societies where long-term relationships are more important. A Malaysian or Mexican business person, for example, will want to get to know you very well before he or she feels happy to start business. But when you do get to know each other, the relationship becomes much deeper than it would in a mobile society.
To Americans, both Europeans and Asians seem cool and formal at first. On the other hand, as a passenger from a less mobile society puts it, it's no fun spending several hours next to a stranger who wants to tell you all about his or her life and asks you all sorts of questions that you don't want to answer.
Cross-cultural differences aren’t just a problem for travelers, but also for people in daily life. Some societies have “universalist” cultures. These societies strongly respect rules, and they treat every person and situation in basically the same way. “Particularist”(强调特性的) societies also have rules, but they are less important than the society' s unwritten ideas about what is right or wrong for a particular situation or a particular person. So the normal rules are changed to fit the needs of the situation or the importance of the person.
What is the main idea of this passage?
一级目录: 第四部分 综合知识
二级目录: 第二章 阅读理解（Reading Comprehension）
A: Polite behavior varies with different cultures.
B: Less mobile societies have fewer rules.
C: People from mobile societies are more polite.
Analyze:
【考情点拨】主旨大意题。
【应试指导】文章第一句就点明了主旨，即对礼貌行为的观点随着文化的不同而有所不同，接下来以实例证明了这种说法，所以本题应选A。

Title:

Title:
Passage One
Animals have different ways of protecting themselves against winter time weather. Some animals grow heavy coats of fur or feathers, while others dig into the ground to find a warm winter time home. Some animals spend the winter in a deep sleep because by going to sleep they avoid the time of the year when food is scarce and the temperatures are low. Their sleep is known as hibernation.
There is much about hibernation that puzzles scientists. For example, they are wondering how hibernation came into being. Some scientists have explored the possibility that animals release a chemical that starts them hibernating.
One thing that scientists are certain about is that animals hibernate only when it is cold. Hibernation is a seasonal practice.
Some animals that fall into a wintertime sleep are not true hibernators because they spend only a part of the cold season asleep. Bears, for example, can easily be awakened from their winter nap. They are not true hibernators.
Sometimes it is difficult to determine whether a particular animal is a true hibernator. For example, some mice hibernate, but others do not. The same is true of bats. Some of them hibernate. Other do not.
Hibernation is a seasonal practice. This means it_______ .
一级目录: 第四部分 综合知识
二级目录: 第二章 阅读理解（Reading Comprehension）
A: takes place only during a particular season
D: only happens when a species becomes over-populated
Analyze:
【考情点拨】推理判断题。
【应试指导】“hibernation”既然是一个“seasonal practice（季节性的做法）”，那它可能跟季节有关，即它可能仅发生在特定的季节。只有A项符合题意，故选A。

Title:
Passage Three
The intelligence test used most often today are based on the work of a Frenchman, Alfred Binet. In 1905, Binet was asked by the French Ministry of Education to develop a way to identify those children in French schools who were too “mentally deficient(不足的)” to benefit from ordinary schooling and who needed special education. The tests had to distinguish those who were merely behind in school from those who were actually mentally deficient.
The items that Binet and his colleague Theophile Simon included on the test were chosen on the basis of their ideas about intelligence. Binet and Simon believed intelligence includes such abilities as understanding the meaning of words; solving problems, and making commonsense judgements. Two other important assumptions also shaped Binet's and Simon's work: (1) that children with more intelligence will do better in school and (2) that older children have a greater ability than younger children.
Binet's first test consisted of thirty tasks. They were simple things most children learn as a result of their everyday experiences. The tasks were arranged in groups, according to age. Binet decided which tasks were appropriate for a given age group by giving them first to a large number of children of different ages. If more than half of the children of a given age passed a test, it was considered appropriate for that age group.
The main purpose of this passage is to______.
一级目录: 第四部分 综合知识
二级目录: 第二章 阅读理解（Reading Comprehension）
A: tell the origin of intelligence tests
B: explain the basic principle of intelligence tests
C: describe the changes in the content of intelligence tests
D: state the development of intelligence tests
Analyze:
【考情点拨】主旨大意题。
【应试指导】本文讲述了法国人Alfred Binet开始进行智力测试的过程，其目的是告诉我们智力测试的起源。

Title:
Passage One
“When one of the doctors criticizes (批评) me, I get defensive: I feel like a child again, being scolded, and I want to explain that I'm not wrong." says Viola, a nurse. This is a common reaction(反应)to criticism, but not a good one. There are better ways of dealing with criticism.
(1)Try to be objective(客观). When Sol was criticized by his new employer for not having made a sale, Sol's reaction was to feel sorry for himself. “I had put everything I had into making that sale,” Sol says, “and I felt that I had failed as a person. I had to learn through experience not to react like that to each failure."
(2)Take time to cool down. Rather than reacting immediately to criticism, take some time to think over what was said. Your first question should be whether the criticism is fair from the other person's position. The problem may be a simple misunderstanding of what you did or your reasons for doing it.
(3)Take positive(积极的) action. After you cool down, consider what you can do about the situation. The best answer may be “nothing”. “I finally realized that my boss was having personal problems and taking them out on me because I was there," says Sheila. “His criticisms didn't really have anything to do with my work, so nothing I said or did was going to change them. “In Sheila's case, the best way to deal with it was to leave her job. However, that's an extreme reaction. You may simply explain your opinion without expecting an in-depth discussion. You may even decide that the battle isn’t worth fighting this time. The key, in any case, is to have a reasonable plan.
When the writer says that “the best answer maybe ‘nothing’”, he means you may decide_____ .
一级目录: 第四部分 综合知识
二级目录: 第二章 阅读理解（Reading Comprehension）
A: to take no notice of the criticism
C: you need to change your job
Analyze:
【考情点拨】推理判断题。
【应试指导】“nothing”是针对其前一句而作出的回答，即冷静后想一下这种情况下你能做什么，最好的回答是“nothing”，也就是说，你什么也不用做，即不去理会这种批评( to take no notice of the criticism)。

Title:
Passage Two
Men have traveled ever since they first appeared on the earth.
In primitive times they did not travel for pleasure but to find new places where their herds could feed, or to escape from hostile neighbors, or to find more favorable climates. They traveled on foot. Their journeys were long, tiring, and often dangerous. They protected themselves with simple weapons, such as wooden sticks or stone clubs, and by lighting fires at night and, above all, by keeping together.
Being intelligent and creative, they soon discovered easier ways of traveling. They rode on the backs of their domesticated animals; they hollowed out tree trunks and, by using bits of wood as paddles, were able to travel across water.
Later they traveled, not from necessity, but for the joy and excitement of seeing and experiencing new things. This is still the main reason why we travel today.
Traveling, of course, has now become a highly organized business. There are cars and splendid roads, express trains, huge ships and jet airliners, all of which provide us with comforts and security. This sounds wonderful. But there are difficulties. lf you want to go abroad, you need a passport and a visa, ticket, luggage, and a hundred of other things. If you lose any of them, your journey may be ruined.
In the sentence “ ...to escape from hostile neighbors...” ,the word “hostile” means______ .
一级目录: 第四部分 综合知识
二级目录: 第二章 阅读理解（Reading Comprehension）
Analyze:
【考情点拨】词语理解题。
【应试指导】文章第二段讲述了原始人旅行有许多原因，其中包括escape from hostile neighbors，由此可知，hostile是个消极意义的词，很可能表示躲避充满敌意的邻居。四个选项中， friendly与之意义相近，意为“充满敌意的，不友好的”。

Title:
Passage Four
The banana “tree” is actually not a real tree. This is because there is no wood in the stem(树干) rising above the ground. The stem is made up of leaves growing very close together, one inside the other. The leaves spread out at the top of the stem and rise in the air.
Banana plants need a lot of care and attention. They must be provided with water if the normal rainfall doesn't supply enough. The area around the plants must be kept free of weeds(杂草) and grass.
About nine or ten months after planting, a flower appears on the banana plant. This flower is at the end of a long stalk(茎) , which grows from the base up through the center of the stem and turns downward when it comes out from the top. Small bananas form on this flower stalk as it grows downward. Bananas really grow upside down. As the small bananas form on the stalk, they point downward, but as they grow they turn and point upward.
Bananas are harvested while they are still green. Even when they are to be eaten where they are grown, they are not allowed to ripen on the plant. A banana that turns yellow on the plant loses its taste.
The first paragraph in the text mainly discusses _______ .
一级目录: 第四部分 综合知识
二级目录: 第二章 阅读理解（Reading Comprehension）
A: why the stem of the tree is wood
B: how the banana grows on the stem
C: why the banana tree is not a tree
D: how the leaves grow out of the stem
Analyze:
【考情点拨】主旨大意题。
【应试指导】文章一开始就点名了主旨，说香蕉树并不能说是一棵真正意义上的树，并在后文阐明了原因（why the banana tree is not a tree）。

Title:
Passage Five
How can we get rid of garbage? Do we have enough energy sources to meet our future energy needs?
These are two important questions that many people are asking today. Some people think that man might be able to solve both problems at the same time. They suggest using garbage as an energy source, and at the same time it can save the land to hold garbage.
For a long time, people buried garbage or dumped it on empty land. Now, empty land is scarce.
But more and more garbage is produced each year. However, garbage can be a good fuel to use. The things in garbage do not look like coal, petroleum, or natural gas; but they are chemically similar to these fossil fuels. As we use up our fossil-fuel supplies, we might be able to use garbage as an energy source. Burning garbage is not a new idea. Some cities in Europe and the United States have been burning garbage for years. The heat that is produced by burning garbage is used to boil water. The steam that is produced is used to make electricity or to heat nearby buildings. In Paris, France, some power plants burn almost 2 million metric tons of the city's garbage each year. The amount of energy produced is about the same as would be produced by burning almost a half million barrels of oil.
Our fossil fuel supplies are limited. Burning garbage might be one kind of energy source that we can use to help meet our energy needs. This method could also reduce the amount of garbage piling up on the earth.
What is the author's attitude?
一级目录: 第四部分 综合知识
二级目录: 第二章 阅读理解（Reading Comprehension）
Analyze:
【考情点拨】理解推断题。
【应试指导】通读全文特别是最后一段可知，作者对这种处理垃圾的办法是持赞成态度的，故选C。

Title:
Passage Three
There is no creature that does not need sleep or complete rest every day.
If you want to know why, just try going without sleep for a long period of time. You will discover that your mind and body would become too tired to work properly. You would become irritable and find it hard to think clearly or concentrate on your work. So sleep is quite simply the time when the cells of your body recover from the work of the day and build up supplies of energy for the next period of activity.
One of the things we all know about sleep is that we are unconscious in sleep. We do not know what is going on around us. But that doesn't mean the body stops all activity. The important organs continue to work during sleep, but most of the body functions are slowed down.
For example, our breathing becomes slower and deeper. The heart beats more slowly, and the blood pressure is lower. Our arms and legs become limp(柔软的) and muscles are at rest. It would be impossible for our body to relax to such an extent if we were awake. So sleep does for us what the quietest rest cannot do.
Your body temperature becomes lower when you are asleep, which is the reason people go to sleep under some kind of covers. And even though you are unconscious, many of your reflexes(反射动作) still work. For instance, if someone tickles(使觉得痒) your foot, you will put it away in your sleep, or even brush a fly from your forehead. You do these things without knowing it.
In the clause “...that we are unconscious in sleep” (Para.3), the word “unconscious” means_______ .
一级目录: 第四部分 综合知识
二级目录: 第二章 阅读理解（Reading Comprehension）
D: not knowing what is happening around
Analyze:
【考情点拨】词语理解题。
【应试指导】本句出现于文章的第三段第一句，接下来的一句是对unconscious一词的进一步解释，即not knowing what is going on around us。

Title:
Passage One
There is a popular belief among parents that schools are no longer interested in spelling. No school I have taught in has ever ignored spelling or considered it unimportant as a basic skill. There are, however, vastly different ideas about how to teach it, or how much priority it must be giver over general language development and writing ability. The problem is , how to encourage a child to express himself freely and confidently in writing without holding him back with the complexities of spelling.
If spelling becomes the only focal point of his teacher's interest, clearly a bright child will be likely to “play safe". He will tend to write only words within his spelling range, choosing to avoid adventurous language. That's why teachers often encourage the early use of dictionaries and pay attention to content rather than technical ability.
I was once shocked to read on the bottom of a sensitive piece of writing about a personal experience: “This work is terrible! There are far too many spelling errors and your writing is illegible (难以辨认的). ”It may have been a sharp criticism of the pupil's technical abilities in writing, but it was also a sad reflection on the teacher who had omitted to read the essay, which contained some beautiful expressions of the child's deep feelings. The teacher was not wrong to draw attention to the errors, but if his priorities had centred on the child's idea, an expression of his disappointment with the presentation would have given the pupil more motivation to seek improvement.
The expression “play safe” probably means______ .
一级目录: 第四部分 综合知识
二级目录: 第二章 阅读理解（Reading Comprehension）
D: to avoid using words one is not sure of
Analyze:
【考情点拨】词语理解题。
【应试指导】文章第二段第一句指出，如果教师们过分关注拼写问题，聪明的孩子就可能“做得安全些”，随后又解释到，那就是只用自己有把握拼写正确的词语。

Title:
Passage Three
In ancient times wealth was measured and exchanged in things that could be touched: food, tools, and precious metals and stones. Then the barter system was replaced by coins, which still had real value since they were pieces of rare metal. Coins were followed by fiat money, paper notes that have value only because everyone agrees to accept them.
Today electronic monetary systems are gradually being introduced that will transform money into even less tangible forms, reducing it to a series of “bits and bytes”, or units of computerized information, going between machines at the speed of light. Already, electronic fund transfer allows money to be instantly sent and received by different banks, companies, and countries through computers and telecommunications devices.
Which of the following would be the most appropriate title for the passage?
一级目录: 第四部分 综合知识
二级目录: 第二章 阅读理解（Reading Comprehension）
Analyze:
【考情点拨】主旨大意题。
【应试指导】通读全文可知，文章主要讲的是货币发展的历史，故选B。

Title:
Passage Four
Mr. Smith was a wealthy industrialist, but he was not satisfied with life. He did not sleep well and his food did not agree with him. This situation lasted for some time. Finally, after several sleepless nights, he decided to consult his doctor. The doctor advised a change of surroundings. “Go abroad,” he said. “But I'm not good at foreign language," said Mr. Smith. “It doesn't matter,” said the doctor. “It won't hurt you to talk a little less. Go on a voyage. Take plenty of exercise. Try to reduce your weight. Avoid rich food.
Mr. Smith went to Switzerland. He did not know French or German, and had to communicate through gestures. He attended a physical training course. The instructor made him bend his knees, swing his arms, stretch his neck and shake his head rapidly. He had to lie on the ground and raise his right and left legs alternately. After a time his muscles grew hard and firm. He forgot the financial crisis and the importance of raising the level of production. He even began to notice individual trees and individual birds.
Finally he returned home. But unfortunately his improvement was only temporary. Soon he was a normal businessman again, worried about his property, his profits, his savings, his advancement in a technological society, and things in general.
In the second paragraph, the word “gestures” means_______ .
一级目录: 第四部分 综合知识
二级目录: 第二章 阅读理解（Reading Comprehension）
Analyze: 【考情点拨】词语理解题。 文章第二段第二句讲到，史密斯先生不懂法语和德语，必须通过“gesture”才能与他人交流。由此得知gestures的意思应是body movements 。

Title:
新学期伊始,你们班准备组织一场迎新晚会,让同学们熟悉起来。你(Li Yuan)打算邀请外教(Tim)来参加迎新晚会。请给他写一封e-mail,内容包括:
(1)邀请他参加迎新晚会;
(2)介绍迎新晚会的一些活动安排;
(3)希望他能够做个简短发言;
(4)期待他的到来。
一级目录: 第四部分 综合知识
Analyze:
To： Tim123@126.com
From： Liyuan123@126.com
Date： Nov. 20th， 2020
About： Welcome Party
Dear Tim，
I’m wring to invite you to join our welcome party to be held at 20：00 p.m. on Nov. 25th. The location will be in the lecture room 504 in teaching building. At that time， you will also meet some of the students and teachers you know very well. During my party， we’ll hold dancing and singing performances. It would be great pity for your not coming. Your preparation with speech would be highly appreciated!
It will be about 10 minutes to reach the lecture room on foot from your apartment. It is just next to the library.
I’m looking forward to your immediate reply， telling me about your final decision.
Sincerely Yours，
Li Yuan

Title: Directions: 当你在某单位已工作了两年，期待更换工作环境，并寻求更好的发展，选择辞职。请注明辞职的原因，并对企业这段时间的培养表示感谢。最后说明会保持联系，永远不会忘记这段珍贵的回忆。
一级目录: 第四部分 综合知识
三级目录: 商务信函（求职信、辞职信）
Analyze:
写作评分标准
1．评分原则：
(1)本题总分为25分，分五档给分。
(2)评分时，先根据文章的内容和语言确定其所属档次，然后根据该档次的具体要求给分。
(3)纳入第五档次的作文应取得至少两位阅卷教师的认可。
(4)字数不足100或超出120的，酌情扣1分~2分。
(5)拼写与标点符号的准确性视其对表达的影响程度予以评分。英、美式拼写均可。
(6)如书写较差，以至影响表达，将分数降低一个档次。

Title:

We could have fun doing absolutely nothing at all-because the （1）________we provided each other with was enough. Rather than discussing operas, Lewinsky, or the weather, we enjoyed just（2）________each other without any one of us trying to outsmart the others. Still, I realize that these adults had a（3）________to be concerned about t direction my friends were（4）________i also was concerned for them, but I wasn't about to（5）________them.
  Many times i would advise my friends that some activity may be （6）________or to think things through before d something, but I would never claim to hold the moral high ground and to condescend to them. When Marvin would begin rolling joints, when Alisa would tell me she skipped school because of a hangover, or when Merriam would tell me that her new boy friend was in a street gang, I expressed my discomfort with their （7）________However, I never （8）________them with the threat of taking my friendship away Contrary to the commercials on television, you can have （9）________ who use drugs. In fact, probably everyone does without （10）________ it.
请回答第（1）空

Title:
Research shows that by using computers,students become better problemsolvers and better communicators.Over anetwork,using(1)andsharing files,students have the chance to collaborate and work(2)with other classmates,peers,and teachers.Networking electronically can(3)learners create,analyze,and produce information and ideas more(4)and efficiently. Networking people 'put the inspiring and usable set of tools(5)reach of the mass of computer(6),empowering them to(7)beyond simply processing information to design, publish,and express'(Mello,1996). Through this (8)electronic access to the world around them, students'social awareness and (9)increase.Networking(10)them from the limitations of(11)writing tools that often inhibit and restrict writing processes.Learning is then (12)from a traditional passive-listening exercise to an experience of discovery,exploration,and excitement.Students can begin to(13)their full potential when(14)are empowered to contribute and collaborate as a team to accomplish their writing tasks (15)effectively.
请回答第（1）空
一级目录: 第四部分 综合知识
Analyze: 短文第一句话提到学生通过使用计算机提高了某些方面的能力，如解决问题的能力和与人沟通的能力。下面又说学生通过什么方式在网上与别人合作。既然是网上的合作，又已给出其中一个是共同享用文件，另一个就应当是电子邮件了。Letter 通常指的是通过由局由寄的信件。Message 通常指电，话留言。选项B 是正确的。

Analyze: writing tools that often inhibit and restrict writing processes这个句子。That 从句修饰写作工具是什么样的，说这样的工具常常是 inhibit andrestrict 了写作过程。两个动词并列，说明意思属于同类。strict 严格的，形容词，加前缀 re构成动词，意思不会有大的改变 （限制、约束）。前一个动词即便不知道也不影响对这句话的理解 （inhibit 抑制、约束）。再看这个空的前面已有 limitation（限制）说明后面的写作是要限制作者的。由此断定，这种写作只能是传统的。第 11 题选项D是正确的。

Title:
Research shows that by using computers,students become better problemsolvers and better communicators.Over anetwork,using(1)andsharing files,students have the chance to collaborate and work(2)with other classmates,peers,and teachers.Networking electronically can(3)learners create,analyze,and produce information and ideas more(4)and efficiently. Networking people "put the inspiring and usable set of tools(5)reach of the mass of computer(6),empowering them to(7)beyond simply processing information to design, publish,and express"(Mello,1996). Through this (8)electronic access to the world around them, students'social awareness and (9)increase.Networking(10)them from the limitations of(11)writing tools that often inhibit and restrict writing processes.Learning is then (12)from a traditional passive-listening exercise to an experience of discovery,exploration,and excitement.Students can begin to(13)their full potential when(14)are empowered to contribute and collaborate as a team to accomplish their writing tasks (15)effectively.
请回答第（12）空
一级目录: 第四部分 综合知识
Analyze: 根据上下文，网络的写作是由原来的被动变成了主动，因此，学习得到了改善。选项 C 是正确的。再一个判断是根据语法，这里是被动态，需要一个动词的过去分词，D 选项被排除。剩下的两个就很容易从字面的意义排除了。Moved 搬运，pass 传递，transfer 转移，transform 改善。

Title:
Research shows that by using computers,students become better problemsolvers and better communicators.Over anetwork,using(1)andsharing files,students have the chance to collaborate and work(2)with other classmates,peers,and teachers.Networking electronically can(3)learners create,analyze,and produce information and ideas more(4)and efficiently. Networking people "put the inspiring and usable set of tools(5)reach of the mass of computer(6),empowering them to(7)beyond simply processing information to design, publish,and express"(Mello,1996). Through this (8)electronic access to the world around them, students'social awareness and (9)increase.Networking(10)them from the limitations of(11)writing tools that often inhibit and restrict writing processes.Learning is then (12)from a traditional passive-listening exercise to an experience of discovery,exploration,and excitement.Students can begin to(13)their full potential when(14)are empowered to contribute and collaborate as a team to accomplish their writing tasks (15)effectively.
请回答第（13）空
一级目录: 第四部分 综合知识
Analyze: 全文强调的是通过网络，学生增加了合作，也因此增强了信心，提高了能力，同时意识到了自己潜在的能力。选项 B 是正确的。Realize 意识到，see 看到，dream 梦想，develop 发展。

Title:
Research shows that by using computers,students become better problemsolvers and better communicators.Over anetwork,using(1)andsharing files,students have the chance to collaborate and work(2)with other classmates,peers,and teachers.Networking electronically can(3)learners create,analyze,and produce information and ideas more(4)and efficiently. Networking people "put the inspiring and usable set of tools(5)reach of the mass of computer(6),empowering them to(7)beyond simply processing information to design, publish,and express"(Mello,1996). Through this (8)electronic access to the world around them, students'social awareness and (9)increase.Networking(10)them from the limitations of(11)writing tools that often inhibit and restrict writing processes.Learning is then (12)from a traditional passive-listening exercise to an experience of discovery,exploration,and excitement.Students can begin to(13)their full potential when(14)are empowered to contribute and collaborate as a team to accomplish their writing tasks (15)effectively.
请回答第（14）空
一级目录: 第四部分 综合知识
Analyze: 这里指学生，因此应是 they .选项C 是正确的。

Title:
Research shows that by using computers,students become better problemsolvers and better communicators.Over anetwork,using(1)andsharing files,students have the chance to collaborate and work(2)with other classmates,peers,and teachers.Networking electronically can(3)learners create,analyze,and produce information and ideas more(4)and efficiently. Networking people 'put the inspiring and usable set of tools(5)reach of the mass of computer(6),empowering them to(7)beyond simply processing information to design, publish,and express'(Mello,1996). Through this (8)electronic access to the world around them, students'social awareness and (9)increase.Networking(10)them from the limitations of(11)writing tools that often inhibit and restrict writing processes.Learning is then (12)from a traditional passive-listening exercise to an experience of discovery,exploration,and excitement.Students can begin to(13)their full potential when(14)are empowered to contribute and collaborate as a team to accomplish their writing tasks (15)effectively.
请回答第（15）空
一级目录: 第四部分 综合知识
Analyze: 使用电子工具写作当然比传统的写作要更有效。副词 effectively的比较常用more.选项C 是正确的。

Title: He ______ at the boy into silence
Analyze:
【考情点拨】考查动词词义辨析。
句意：他把那个孩子盯得不敢吱声。glance 扫视;observe 与 watch 是及物动词，不与at 搭配;从句子 的意思来讲,stare“凝视,盯着看”更贴切。

Title: Last year, some poor people had hardly_ __ the severe winter
Analyze:
【考情点拨】考查动词词义辨析。
【应试指导】句意：去年,有些穷人几乎难以活过严冬。remain 保留，剩余；live 生活；endure 忍耐（受）；survive 继续生活或存在（后可直接跟宾语）。根据句意,应选 D。

Title: He promised that he would ____to get us two tickets of the soccer game.
Analyze:
【考情点拨】考查动词词义辨析。
【应试指导】句意:他许诺设法给我们搞到两张足球比赛的票。manage 设法;manage to do sth.设法 做某事,符合题意。fulfil 履行,实现;accomplish 完成;succeed 成功做......，一般用于 succeed in doing sth.句式中。

Title: The general strike is a means of___ the total authority of the government
Analyze:
【考情点拨】考查动词词义辨析。
【应试指导】句意：总罢工是对政府绝对权威进行挑战的一种方式。inform 通知；recommend 推荐，介绍；challenge 向...挑战;transform 转变，改变。

Title: The ship_______from behind the fog
Analyze:
【考情点拨】考查动词词义辨析。
【应试指导】句意：船从雾里露了出来。emerge 显现,浮现;drive, pass, turn—般不直接与 from 连用。

Title: This ticket______ you to a free meal in our new restaurant.
Analyze:
【考情点拨】考查动词词义辨析。
【应试指导】句意：这张票能让你在我们新开张的饭店免费吃上一顿饭。give 给，给予，一般用于give sb. sth.或 give sth. to sb.句式中;grant 给予，授予，一般用于 grant sb. sth.句式中；entitle 给... 权利（或资格），entitle sb. to sth.使某人有资格...；credit 相信,信任。

Title: You______ her in her office last Friday; she’s been out of town for two weeks.
Analyze:
【考情点拨】考查情态动词。
【应试指导】句意：在上周五你不可能在她的办公室看见她，她离开本市已经两星期了。needn’t have done 表示不必做某事，而实际上已经做了，含没有必要或浪费的意思。根据该题后半句的意思判断 A项错。B 项和 C 项是对发生在过去的事情的一种推断，只是程度不同，因为是肯定形式，不合题意，也错。must have been 的否定形式应为 can’t have done,所以 D 正确。

Title: That was so serious a matter that I had no choice but_______ the police.
Analyze:
【考情点拨】考查“but +动词不定式”结构。
【应试指导】句意：那件事如此严重，除了请警察，我别无选择。这种结构一般有两种模式:have no choice but + 带 to 不定式或 have nothing to do but +不带 to 不定式。

Title: _______ at such a time, his work attracted much attention
Analyze:
【考情点拨】考查非谓语动词。
【应试指导】句意：他的作品在这样一个时刻出版，受到了很大关注。his work 与 publish 之间为被动关系，故用过去分词形式。

Title: Silver is the best conductor of electricity，copper______ it closely
Analyze:
【考情点拨】考查非谓语动词。
【应试指导】句意:银是最好的导电体,铜紧次之。copper 与 follow 之间为主动关系，故用现在分词形式。

Title: Go back to your room and leave me______
二级目录: 第五章 形容词和副词
Analyze:
【考情点拨】考查形近词词义辨析。
句意：回你的房间去，让我一人待一会儿 leave sb. alone 表示“ 别打扰某人，让某人单独待着”lonely 孤单的，孤独的；along 沿着;almost 几乎。

Title: He was found______ one month after he was born
二级目录: 第五章 形容词和副词
Analyze:
【考情点拨】考查形容词词义辨析。
【应试指导】句意：他出生一个月后被发现是个哑巴。quiet 安静的；still 静止不动的；silent 不说话的；dumb 哑的，不会说话的。

Title: Mr.Verder never thought that he would become a member of the board of directors because of his _______origin.
二级目录: 第五章 形容词和副词
Analyze:
【考情点拨】考查形容词词义辨析。
【应试指导】句意：由于出身卑微,傅德先生从未想过他会成为董事会的一员。humble 卑微的；previous 先前的，以前的；critical 批评的；false 错误的。

Title: They took_______measures to prevent poisonous gases from escaping.
二级目录: 第五章 形容词和副词
Analyze:
【考情点拨】考查形容词词义辨析。
【应试指导】句意:他们采取了有效措施防止毒气泄漏。fruitful 硕果累累的，成功的；beneficial对......有益的，有利的；valuable 有价值的；effective 有放的，产生效果的。

Title: The facilities of the older hotel_______.
二级目录: 第五章 形容词和副词
A: is as good or better than the new hotel
B: are as good or better than the new hotel
C: is as good as or better than that of the new hotel
D: are as good as or better than those of the new hotel
Analyze:
【考情点拨】考查主谓一致和比较级的用法。
【应试指导】句意：那家旧些的旅馆的设施和新旅馆的设施一样好,或旧旅馆的设施比新旅馆的设施更好。主语 facilities 为复数，首先排除 A、C 两项。B 项的比较对象不妥当，D 项为比较级正确形式。

Title: He claimed that he would be a _______in the presidential election, and would win the election at last.
Analyze:
【考情点拨】考查名词词义辨析。
【应试指导】句意：他声称要作为候选人参加总统竞选，而且最终将赢得胜利。voter 选民；candidate 选人；partner 伙伴;comrade 同志。

Title: I’d rather marry a man who had a(n) _____ of humour than one who was very attractive
Analyze:
【考情点拨】考查名词词义辨析。
【应试指导】句意：我宁可嫁给一个具有幽默感的人，也不嫁给一个非常有魅力的人。capability能力；sight 视力，眼界；knowledge 知识；sense 感觉，sense of humor 幽默感。

Title: Although I like the appearance of the house, what really made me decide to buy it was the beautiful _______through the window.
Analyze:
【考情点拨】考查名词词义辨析。
【应试指导】句意:尽管我也喜欢这栋房子的外观,但真正使我决定买它的原因是窗外的美丽景色。view 景色，风景，符合句意。vision 看法，视力；look 神色；picture 图画，画面。

Title: I haven’t decided which hotel______.
Analyze:
【考情点拨】考查“疑问代词+不定式”的用法。
【应试指导】句意：我还没有决定下榻哪家宾馆。因为 stay 为不及物动词，需加介词 at。

Title: My father asked _____ to help with his work.
Analyze: 英语句子里人称代词并列用法的排列顺序 ：首先说“你”，因为你在我面前，是为了表示对你的尊敬；然后说“他”，也是对他的尊敬；最后再提自己。这句主语时my father ,Tom和我是宾语，要用宾格，因此选B。

Title: A few days ago I visited a friend of _____ and that day I learned a valuable lesson.
Analyze: 名词性物主代词，等于My friend，“我的朋友”，选B。

Title: _____ can be good at something for 40years if he doesn’t love it .
Analyze:
根据句子“如果不喜欢一个行业的话，要40年如一日地好它，谁也没那本事。”
Anybody任何人 、Everybody每个人、Nobody没有人、Somebody某人

Title:
—Alice ,turn off the light and lock the door before you leave.
— ________ .
Analyze: 句意”Alice,离开之前把灯关掉，把门锁好。”“知道了”。Got it 是知道，明白；made it “约定时间，做成某事”

Title: I would appreciate ________ if you could pay it in cash .
Analyze: 句意：如果能支付现金，那就再好不过了。appreciate it if... 。如果….将十分感激；

Title: He insisted that she______ improve her oral English by doing a lot of practice
Analyze:
【考情点拨】考查虚拟语气。
【应试指导】句意：他坚持认为她应该通过大量练习来提高口语。insist 后的宾语从句中的谓语应用虚拟语气， 即“should +动词原形”，should 也可省略。

Title: If only the committee_______the regulations( 规章）and put them into effect as soon as possible.
Analyze:
【考情点拨】考查虚拟语气。
【应试指导】句意:要是委员会尽快批准这些规章制度并付诸实施就好了。由 if only 引导的句子须用虚拟语气形式，此处表示现在情况的虚拟语气,应用“would +动词原形”的形式。

Title: We wouldn’t lose heart even if we_______again.
Analyze:
【考情点拨】考查虚拟语气。
【应试指导】句意：即使我们再次失败,也不会丧失信心。主句用“would +动词原形”，从句用一般过去式。

Title: It is politely requested by the hotel management that radios___after 11 o’clock at night.
Analyze:
【考情点拨】考查虚拟语气。
【应试指导】句意:饭店管理部门恳请客人晚上 11 点以后不要打开收音机。动词 request 所接从句要用虚拟语气，其结构为"should +动词原形” ，should 可省略。且此处表示被动，故选 C。

Title: Make a note of it _______you should forget it.
Analyze:
【考情点拨】考查词义辨析。
【应试指导】句意:把这件事记一下，免得你忘了。根据句意，应选 D。lest 免得，后接从句，需用 虚拟语气，且 should 可省略。

Title: He drove to the airport to _______Mr. Dixon who came to see him from Orlando.
Analyze:
【考情点拨】考查词组词义辨析。
【应试指导】句意:他开车去机场接从奥兰多来看他的狄克逊先生。pick up 接（人）；set out 出发;call for 需要；turn down 拒绝，关小。

Title: The university_______ four colleges and five academies
Analyze:
【考情点拨】考查词组词义辨析。
【应试指导】句意：这所大学是由四所学院和五所研究院组成的。表示“由........组成”的词组有be made up of, be composed of, consist of 等。经过排除，正确答案为 B。

Title: _______ ，he is not a very bright pupil
A: As far as his intelligence is concerned
B: As far his intelligence is concerned
D: As far as his intelligence are concerned
Analyze:
【考情点拨】考查固定搭配。
【应试指导】句意：就智力而言，他并非是一位非常聪明的学生。as far as…be concerned 为固定词组，意为 就......而言”。又因为 intelligence —词为不可数名词，故选 A。

Title: You should have been more patient_______ that customer ；I’m sure that selling him the watch was a possibility.
Analyze:
【考情点拨】考查固定搭配。
【应试指导】句意：你应该对那位顾客更耐心些的，我相信他有可能买这块表。be patient with sb.对......有耐心。

Title: We gave out a cheer when the red roof of the cottage came______View.
Analyze:
【考情点拨】考查固定搭配。
【应试指导】句意：看到小屋的红屋顶时，我们都欢呼起来。come into view 为固定搭配，意为“进入视线，视野”。

Title: He is quite thoughtless, for very seldom can he _______other people’s troubles.
Analyze:
【考情点拨】考查词组词义辨析。
【应试指导】句意:他相当粗心，很少能体会到别人遇到困难时的感受。agree with 同意......的意见；interfere with 妨碍;identify with 在感情等方面与人一致;rest with 由.......负责。

Title: He is _______nervous_______ he moved about the room all the time.
Analyze:
【考情点拨】考查 such…that 和 so...that 的用法。
【应试指导】句意：他非常紧张，以至于他在房间里徘徊不停。so...that 意为“如此……以至于” ，so 后接形容词、副词等。而 such...that 也意为“如此.... 以至于”，但 such 后应接名词。

Title: Not only______ very well, but also_______ well.
Analyze:
【考情点拨】 考查 not only...but also 的用法。
【应试指导】 句意:她不仅善于烹调，而且善于跳舞。not only 放在句首时，句子要倒装，但 but also后的句子不必倒装。

Title: Thoughts are expressed_______words
Analyze:
【考情点拨】考查词组词义辨析。
【应试指导】句意：思想是通过语言来表达的。by all means 尽一切办法,务必;by no means 绝不，并没有;by the way 顺便说一下；by means of 用，凭借。

Title: Does everyone on earth have an equal right_______an equal share of its resources?
Analyze:
【考情点拨】考查固定搭配。
【应试指导】句意:地球上的每一个人对地球上的资源都享有同等的权利吗？ right to 意为“...的权利”

Title: She was so_______in her job that she didn’t hear anybody knocking at the door.
Analyze:
【考情点拨】考查固定搭配。
【应试指导】句意：她工作如此专心以至于没有听到有人敲门。be absorbed in 为固定搭配，意为“专心致志做某事”。A、C、D 三项均与句子构不成搭配。

Title: The manager needs an assistant that he can_______to take care of problems in his absence.
Analyze:
【考情点拨】考查词组词义辨析。
【应试指导】句意：经理需要一个他能够依靠的助手，在他不在时助手可以处理问题。count on 依靠，依赖；count in 把......计算在内；count up 加起来;count out 逐个地数。

Title: It is kind_______ you to do me a favor at this moment.
二级目录: 第十一章 强调和倒装
Analyze:
【考情点拨】考查固定句型。
【应试指导】句意:谢谢你在这个时候来帮我。It is + adj + of sb. to do sth.是固定句型。

Title:
— My room gets very cold at night
—_______
二级目录: 第十一章 强调和倒装
Analyze:
【考情点拨】考查倒装语序。
【应试指导】句意:-- 我的房间到晚上就变得很冷。--- 我的也是。由 so, neither, nor 开头的句子，表示重复前面句子的部分意思,但前后两句的主语不同，且句子应用倒装结构。

Title: The organization had broken no rules, but___had it acted responsibly.
二级目录: 第十一章 强调和倒装
Analyze:
【考情点拨】考查倒装句。
【应试指导】句意：该机构没有违规,但也没有很负责任地操作。后半句为倒装句，所以 A 项正确。
C、D 两项可排除。使用 so 的前提是前面句子必须是肯定句，所以 B 项错。

Title: _______parents say and do has a life-long effect on their children.
二级目录: 第十一章 强调和倒装
Analyze:
【考情点拨】考查主语从句。
【应试指导】句意：父母的言行对他们的孩子有终生的影响。从句中缺少宾语，排除 that,因 that在名词性从句中不充当任何成分。which 有选择含义，应排除。what 符合题意。

Title: I’d like to live somewhere______ the sun shines all year long.
二级目录: 第十一章 强调和倒装
Analyze:
【考情点拨】考查定语从句。

Title: Let’s think of a situation______ this idiom can be used.

Title: It was not until midnight_______they reached the campsite.

Title: Let's go into the garden and＿some roses for your mother.

Title: We' re looking ＿to hearing from you soon.

Title: He was disappointed to find his suggestions __.
Analyze: 短语turn down拒绝否决的意思。

Analyze: 短语can (could) not help doing忍不住做某事。

Title: WTO stands __the World Trade Organization.
Analyze: 短语stand for代表或象征的意思。

Title: My sister is used to __with all the windows open.
Analyze: be used to doing sth. 习惯于做某事。

Title: Finally he managed to get into contact __them.
Analyze: get contact with sb. 与某人联系。

Title: There are 10__ assistants in that __shop.
Analyze: 妇女的名词复数women.鞋店用单数shoe shop

Title: I found her sitting in the corner, reading __ newspaper, with __in her eyes.
Analyze: 报纸可数，一张报纸用单数a. 眼泪是几滴眼泪，不确定数目，用名词复数tears.

Title: I need__ cloth,for I'm going to make __ clothes.
Analyze: cloth表示布料，不可数名词。clothes表示衣服，可数名词。

Title: The education of__ young has become__hot and serious topic in the present society.
Analyze: 定冠词the+形容词，表示这类人。不定冠词a+可数名词单数，表泛指。

Title: How beautiful you are today! I like __design of your shoes. They are __match for your dress.
Analyze: 定冠词the+of+名词，表示所有格。不定冠词a+可数名词单数表泛指。

Title: Have you heard__ news? The price of__ petrol is going up again!
Analyze: 定冠词the表特指。petrol石油是不可数名词，零冠词（什么都不写）表不可数名词的泛指。

Title: We went right round to the west coast by __sea instead of driving across__continent.
Analyze: 零冠词（什么都不写）表不可数名词的泛指，定冠词the+大陆continent表独一无二的。

Title: __apple fell from the tree and hit him on__head.
Analyze: 不定冠词an+可数名词apple表泛指。砸在某人头部hit someone one  the head.

Title: Of all the books on the desk, ___is of any use for our study.
Analyze: 不定代词，表示三者以上，全部否定，用none.

Title: ___of the people on the net ___China's economy is among the strongest in the world
Analyze: 五分之四的人们是复数，分子用基数词，分子大于等于2，分母用序数词复数。动词用原形believe

Title: China is___ larger than the United States.
Analyze: 六分之一，分子用基数词，分母用序数词。

Title: The hotel wasn't particularly good, but I _____ in many worse hotels.

Title: I wonder whether the soldier is one of those who ___ abroad to keep peace.
Analyze: one of those是复数形式，用have been，和前文的wonder时态保持一致。

Title:
Did you go to the show last night?
   Yeah. Every boy and girl in the area _____invited.
Analyze: 不定代词every,用单数形式，和前文did时态一致，用过去时。

Title: The rich _____not always happy.
Analyze: 定冠词the+形容词rich表示这类人，用复数形式。有钱人不常开心，用于一般现在时。

Title: ___ ways to be more gentle with the Earth, or we'll be punished.

Really?  If I ____so busy, l would have gone with you.

Analyze: 假如我当时没那么忙，我当初就会和你一起去。虚拟语气与过去的事实相反，if引导的条件状语从句用过去完成时。

Title: The women carrying babies, come in first, ___?

Title:

Title: The view ___many scientists hold is___ too much emission of carbon dioxide is destructive.
二级目录: 第十章 简单句、并列句、复合句
Analyze: 第一个that引导的是主语the view的同位语从句。第二个that引导的是表语从句。

Title: I had an experience some years ago; ____ taught me something I'll never forget.

Analyze: 逗号隔开，which引导的是非限定性定语从句，并未具体指代某个单词，而是进行补充说明，整句话结构更松散。

Title: The moment _____Leo will never forget is ____ Mr. Green gave him a lot of valuable advice on   how to improve his writing.
二级目录: 第十章 简单句、并列句、复合句

Title: It is imagination ___ makes the world colorful, full of vigor and vitality.

Title: It was not until midnight____they reached the campsite.

Title: Many children, ____parents are away working in big cities, are taken good care of in the village.

Analyze:

【应试指导】句意：很多小孩在村里都得到了很好的照顾，他们的父母远在大城市里打工。whose引导非限制性定语从句，且在从句中作定语，符合题意。

Title: The organization had broken no rules, but ____had it acted responsibly.

Title:

So now we had only one hour to get to the airport. Luckily, there were not many cars ___3___ buses on the road and we were ___4___ to get there just in time. We checked in and went straight to a big hall to wait for our flight to be called. We waited and waited ___5___ no announcement was made. We asked for ___6___and the girl there told us the plane hadn't even arrived yet. In the end, there came an announcement telling us that those ___7___ for flight No.108 could get a free meal voucher and that the plane hadn't left Spain ___8___ technical problems. We thought that meant ___9___ it until late it wasn't safe for the plane to ___10___. We waited again for a long time until late evening when we were asked to report again. This time we were ___11___ free vouchers to spend the night in a nearby hotel.
The next morning after a ___12___ night because of all the planes taking off and landing, we were reported back to the airport. Guess ___13___ had happened while we were asleep. Our plane had arrived and taken off again. All the other___14___had been waken up in the night to catch the plane, but for some reasons or other we had been ___15___. You can imagine how we felt!

We checked in and went straight to a big hall to wait for our flight to be called. We waited and waited ___5___ no announcement was made. We asked for ___6___and the girl there told us the plane hadn't even arrived yet. In the end, there came an announcement telling us that those ___7___ for flight No.108 could get a free meal voucher and that the plane hadn't left Spain ___8___ technical problems. We thought that meant ___9___ it until late it wasn't safe for the plane to ___10___. We waited again for a long time until late evening when we were asked to report again. This time we were ___11___ free vouchers to spend the night in a nearby hotel.
The next morning after a ___12___ night because of all the planes taking off and landing, we were reported back to the airport. Guess ___13___ had happened while we were asleep. Our plane had arrived and taken off again. All the other___14___had been waken up in the night to catch the plane, but for some reasons or other we had been ___15___. You can imagine how we felt!

Title: Directions: For this part, you are supposed to write an essay in English in 100-120 wordsbased on the following information.Remember to write it neatly.你是刘玲( Liu Ling)，写一封给晓东(Xiao Dong)的道歉信，讲明道歉的原因、解决问题的办法，以弥补因晓东来拜访而自己不在家给他带来的沮丧。
一级目录:
第四部分
综合知识
Analyze:
[参考范文]
Dear Xiao Dong，
I am very sorry that l was out when you came to see me yesterday afternoon. The fact is that I had an engagement with some friends, and l was ignorant of your visit. Not until nine o'clock in the evening did I come back. You must have been disappointed by my absence.
I hope you will not leave the city this week. I'll call you on Friday afternoon at five o'clock. As this is the first time you come to Beijing, I will take you to some places that may interest you.
Please wait for me in your hotel at the appointed time.
Yours truly，
Liu Ling

The committee is totally opposed______any changes being made in the plans.
Analyze:
【考情点拨】考查固定搭配。
【应试指导】句意：委员会完全反对对计划作任何变动。be opposed to构成固定搭配，意为“反对”。

Title: It is important that enough money______to fund the project.
Analyze:
【考情点拨】考查虚拟语气。
【应试指导】句意：重要的是募集足够的钱，为这个项目提供资金。在“It is important that...”结构中，that引导的从句中应使用虚拟语气，即，“should+动词原形”，其中should可省略故选A。

Title: We love peace, yet we are not the kind of people to yield ___ any military threat.
Analyze:
【考情点拨】考查固定搭配。
【应试指导】句意：我们热爱和平，但我们不是那种屈服于武力威胁的人。yield to为固定词组，意为“屈服于……，对……妥协”。

Title: If the whole operation______ beforehand, a great deal of time and money would have been lost.
Analyze:
【考情点拨】考查虚拟语气。
【应试指导】句意：如果事先没有计划好整个运作，大量的时间和金钱将会流失。由would have been lost可知此处表示与过去事实相反的虚拟语气，从句中应使用“had+过去分词”。

Title: You cannot be ______ careful when you drive a car.
二级目录: 第五章 形容词与副词
Analyze:
【考情点拨】考查常用表达方法。
【应试指导】句意：驾驶汽车时，怎么小心都不过分。“cannot be too+形容词”构成特殊用法，意为“无论多么……都不为过”其他几项不合句意。

Title:
Have you ever had to decide whether to go shopping or stay home and watch TV on a weekend? Now you___1___do both at the same time. Home shopping television networks(网络)have become a ___2___ for many people to shop without ___3___ having to leave their home.
Some shoppers are___4___of department stores and supermarkets—fighting the crowds, waiting in long lines, and sometimes having slight ___5___ of finding anything they want to buy. They'd rather sit quietly at home in front of the TV set and watch a friendly announcer describe a product ___6___a model shows it. And they can shop around the clock, buying something ___7___ by making a phone call.
Department stores and even mail-order companies are ___8___ to join in the success of home shopping. Large department stores are busy ___9___ their own TV channels(频道)to encourage TV shopping in the future. Customers can ask questions about products and place ___10___ , all through their TV sets.
Will shopping by television ___11___ take the place of shopping in stores? Some industry managers think so. ___12___ many people find shopping at a real store a great enjoyment. And for many shoppers, it is still important to ___13___or try on dresses they want to buy. That's ___14___ specialists say that in the future, home shopping will ___15___ together with store shopping but will never entirely replace it.
请选择合适的选项填入（ 1）中.

Title: Directions: For this part, you are supposed to write an essay in English in 100-120 wordsbased on the following information.Remember to write it neatly.你是王刚( Wang Gang)，写一封给朋友李明(Li Ming)的祝贺信，祝贺他获得复旦大学计算机科学硕士学位，并祝他今后在学习和研究方面取得成功。
一级目录:
第四部分
综合知识
Analyze:
[参考范文]
Dear Li Ming，
I am delighted to learn that you have received your Master's degree in Computer Science from Fudan University. I write to congratulate you on your success. We have good reason to feel proud of you. We know your degree of Master of Computer Science means diligent study and hard work. As your best friend, I have followed your progress with pleasure and interest. I can imagine how satisfied your parents are at this moment.
As I understand, you will continue studies in America soon. I wish you great success in your studies and research work.
Yours，
Wang Gang

Title: He claimed that he would be a______in the presidential election, and would win the election at last.
